title: Systematic Literature Review to Understand the Role of AIEd (Artificial Intelligence in Education)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic artificial intelligence concepts and foundational educational technology knowledge
context.additional_context: A language education course for early-career professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields, conducting project-based assessments in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three roles of AIEd (new subject/direct mediation/supporting tool) by applying them to actual educational cases.
Learners can map research trends and conduct critical evaluations of AIEd-related studies using systematic literature review methodologies.
Learners can construct a conceptual framework explaining the impact of AI technologies within complex educational systems from a CAS (Complex Adaptive Systems) perspective.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
